mapper.sql: id, supplier_number, supplier_name, address, phone, create_user_id, status, check_user_id, check_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into cg_supplier_certification (id, supplier_number, supplier_name, address, phone, create_user_id, status, check_user_id, check_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select supplier_number from cg_supplier_certification c ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1

select t1.id id, t1.supplier_number supplierNumber, t1.supplier_name supplierName, t1.address address, t1.phone phone, t1.create_user_id createUserId, (select username from t_user where id=t1.create_user_id) createName, t1.status status, t1.check_user_id checkUserId, (select username from t_user where id=t1.check_user_id) checkName, t1.check_time checkTime, t1.create_time createTime, t1.update_time updateTime from cg_supplier_certification t1
`status`=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and `supplier_name` like concat('%',trim(#{supplierName}),'%') or id like trim(#{supplierName})
order by id desc
mapper.insert:
insert into cg_supplier_certification
id,
supplier_number,
supplier_name,
address,
phone,
create_user_id,
status,
check_user_id,
check_time,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update cg_supplier_certification
supplier_number = #{supplierNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_user_id = #{checkUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cg_supplier_certification set supplier_number = #{supplierNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_user_id = #{checkUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
